p: The benefits of milk consumption and the nutrients present in milk and dairy products are many, but basically these products represent sources of calcium and vitamin D as well as proteins and other essential nutrients. In addition, dairy products supply phosphorus, potassium, magnesium, and vitamins A, B12, and riboflavin [ 2]. However, milk has demonstrated its potential to affect health through other substances it contains, such as glutathione, a powerful antioxidant that plays a role in the destruction of free radicals involved in oxidative stress [ 3].
